title: 25 Expert Cat Memes That Advise You to Give Your Cat Treats Right Meow
description: When the cat meows to you and stands next to the fridge / the treats drawer / their only half-full food bowl - you know exactly what they're saying, even if they don't speak your language (and, let's be honest, you're also not fluent in Cat). Your cat demands treats, and they demand it right meow. They might meow very gently and ask for the treats in a polite way, but the cats press their demands in this way or another. Every cat pawrent knows that treats are an essential part of a cat's day.Since you've probably already given treats to your cat (because cat pawrents always cave in to the floofiest of demands, obviously) - it's time for some cat memes. Why? Because your cat is busy eating the tasty treat they've just received, you probably feel the absence of their demanding meows. So we gathered some cat memes that seem to press the treat demands just like cats. They're some sassy cat memes, but full of this fluffy feline cuteness.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 25 Expert Cat Memes That Advise You to Give Your Cat Treats Right Meow - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
When the cat meows to you and stands next to the fridge / the treats drawer / their only half-full food bowl - you know exactly what they're saying, even if they don't speak your language (and, let's be honest, you're also not fluent in Cat). Your cat demands treats, and they demand it right meow. They might meow very gently and ask for the treats in a polite way, but the cats press their demands in this way or another. Every cat pawrent knows that treats are an essential part of a cat's day.

Since you've probably already given treats to your cat (because cat pawrents always cave in to the floofiest of demands, obviously) - it's time for some cat memes. Why? Because your cat is busy eating the tasty treat they've just received, you probably feel the absence of their demanding meows. So we gathered some cat memes that seem to press the treat demands just like cats. They're some sassy cat memes, but full of this fluffy feline cuteness.
